title: Griffith on the Formula Crisis: “No parent should have to worry about how they are going to feed their baby.”
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader for Oversight and Investigations Morgan Griffith (R-VA) delivered opening remarks at today’s Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee hearing on the formula shortage crisis in the United States.

title: Leader Rodgers: Parents Need Immediate Action and Answers on the Baby Formula Crisis
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered the following remarks in today’s Oversight & Investigations Subcommittee hearing on the formula shortage crisis in the United States.

title: Communications and Technology Subcommittee Republican Leader Latta Delivers Remarks on Spectrum Efficiency Legislation
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Communications and Technology Subcommittee Republican Leader Bob Latta (R-OH) delivered remarks at today’s Committee hearing on legislation to improve American leadership in next generation communications technology.

title: Leader Rodgers: “U.S. leadership in next-gen technology depends on our ability to innovate”
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks at today’s Communications and Technology Subcommittee on legislation to strengthen American communications networks.

title: E&C Republicans Request Answers from FDA & GAO Concerning Clinical Trials in China and Research Monitoring
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA), Subcommittee on Health Republican Leader Brett Guthrie (R-KY), and Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations Republican Leader Morgan Griffith (R-VA) sent a letter to Food and Drug Administration (FDA) Commissioner Robert Califf wanting answers on concerns about the increasing number of clinical trials being conducted solely or predominantly in China intended to support approvals for drugs to be marketed in the U.S.

title: E&C Republicans Sound the Alarm on Biden’s Censorship Campaign
description: House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) and committee Republicans have been sounding the alarm on the Biden administration’s ongoing efforts to pressure Big Tech companies to censor speech it disagrees with and silence Americans. The actions taken by the Biden administration are alarming, un-American, and akin to the type of behavior we’ve seen from foreign dictators to destroy freedom and control speech.

title: Legislative Hearing to Protect Consumers and Strengthen the Economy
Formula Safety and Supply: Protecting the Health of America’s Babies
Strengthening our Communications Networks: Legislation to Connect and Protect
